title: Beach painting
text: You've made a painting of a cozy, sandy beach. The sand looks hot and there's a lot of pebbles. You have tried your best

title: Castle painting
text: You've painted an old castle in a valley. You feel like a real painter now.

title: Skeleton painting
text: You've painted a human skeleton. Why? You don't know yourself, but you felt like it. Its bones look shaky.

title: Street painting
text: You've made a painting of a long and curvy street. The trees reside just next to it. It's simple and yet captivating.
